content.rendered:
Directed by Levan Akin. Keith Powell. Alan Taylor. Alexis Ostrander. Craig Zisk.

Written by Jonathan Ceniceroz. Jonathan Ceniceroz. David B. Harris. David B. Harris. Rolin Jones. Rolin Jones. Ben Philippe. Ben Philippe. Anne Rice. Hannah Moscovitch. Coline Abert. Eleanor Burgess.

Cast  Sam Reid( Lestat de Lioncourt ) . Eric Bogosian( Daniel Molloy ) . Assad Zaman( Rashid ) . Bailey Bass( Claudia ) . Kalyne Coleman( Grace de Pointe du Lac ) . Chris Stack( Thomas ‘Tom’ Anderson ) . Christian Robinson( Levi ) . Rae Dawn Chong( Florence de Pointe du Lac ) . Maura Grace Athari( Antoinette ) . John DiMaggio( Alderman Fenwick ) . Jeff Pope( Finn O’Shea ) . Dana Gourrier( Bricktop Williams ) . Rachel Alana Handler( Peg Leg Doris ) . Rudy Eisenzopf( Chief Bardeen ) . Kyle Roussel( Jelly Roll Morton ) . Steven G. Norfleet( Paul de Pointe du Lac ) . Luke Brandon Field( Young Daniel Molloy ) . Gopal Divan( Dr. Fareed Bhansali ) . Damon Daunno( Bruce ) . Brad Heberlee( Man with Cancer ) . Brian Anthony Wilson( Mortician ) . Matthew Dennis Lewis( Matthew McPhail ) . Brent Phillip Henry( San Francisco Bartender ) . Russell Dennis Lewis( Mark McPhail ) . Xavier Mills( Charlie ) . Melissa Lehman( Willing Betty ) . Bryan Fenkart( Deputy Habersham ) . Mary Alice Risener( Leader ) . Choppy Guillotte( Master of Ceremonies ) . Walker Babington( Deputy Bastille ) . Najah Bradley( Lily ) . Jody Thompson( Cornfed Salesman ) . Wendy Miklovic( Opera Society Madame ) . Eugenie Bondurant( Miss Carol ) . Thomas Antony Olajide( Jonah ) . Casey Hendershot( Burly Deputy ) . Amy Chaffee( Widow Meredith ) . Tony Manna( Mr. Carlo ) . Catherine Guffey( T-Strap ) . Chester Rushing( Collegian ) . Escalante Lundy( Milkman ) . Kermit C Burns( Man Flirting ) . Georgia Morgan( Laughing Girl ) . Mike Harkins( Father Matthias ) . Paul Sanchez( Man with Glasses ) . Peyton Turner( Grace’s Twin #1 ) . Anoop Surya( Dubai Butler #1 ) . Zuhair Ahmed( Dubai Butler #2 ) . Paris Turner( Grace’s Twin #2 ) . Aurelien Barnes( Remy Dupre ) . Jaden Begnaud( Dandy Date ) . Cameron Stout( Jacked Sailor ) . Joi Richardson( Working Girl ) . Andre De’Sean Shanks( Fair Play Waiter ) . Kirill Sheynerman( Damek ) . Stephen Walker Jr.( John in the Crowd ) . Garrett Kruithof( Police Captain ) . Kameron Lopreore( Woeful Tenor ) . Grant Pfost( Doughboy on the Coffin Wall ) . Jude Severin( Wedding Pastor ) . Sarah Jane McMahon( Sofia Consoli ) . Rosha Washington( Funny Guest ) . John Charles II( Man on Street ) . Joe Leroy Reynolds( Lawyer ) . Terry J. Nelson( Tourist ) . Nicole Elaine Heinen( Iolanta ) . Ben Daniels( Santiago ) . Vhelma Richardson( Madame Fair Play Brothel (uncredited) ) . Elisha Davis( Liberty Street Girl (uncredited) ) . Elton LeBlanc( Dog Walker (uncredited) ) . Divine Prince Ty Emmecca( Street Car Guy (uncredited) ) . Victoria Harris( Opera Attendee (uncredited) ) . Ernest Marsh( Poker Card Dealer (uncredited) ) . Cynthia LeBlanc( Garden District Pedestrian (uncredited) ) . Danny Cosmo( Cowering Man (uncredited) ) . Kirsten Bazet( Storyville Girl (uncredited) ) . Hunter Taylor( Doughboy (uncredited) ) . Jennifer Dent( Chief Bardeen’s Lady Friend (uncredited) ) . Adam Horwitz( Vicar (uncredited) ) . Ashlei Lewis( Storyville Girl (uncredited) )

Language English.

Producers Rolin Jones. W. Mark McNair. Adam O’Byrne. Coline Abert. Eleanor Burgess. Oliver Coke. Jessica Held. Cory Hubbard. Mark Johnson. Hannah Moscovitch. Brennan Parks. Anne Rice. Christopher Rice. Alan Taylor. Matthieu Rubin.

Production AMC Studios.

 

Number of Seasons 2

Number of Episodes 8

Status OnGoing (2022–)
